name: Tomato Survival
description: This is my first close to complete game (still adding some finishing touches to art and could potentially still add on to the gameplay). You play as a sentient tomato trying to survive the harsh environment it lives in - living through acidic rain, thunder, and even some bombs (because why not?). Collect coins and see how long you can survive! And the longer you live, the tougher the environment becomes so beware!
